inclusion.criterion: Histologically or cytologically confirmed adenocarcinoma of the prostate
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: metastatic bone disease (by CT, MRI or bone scan) with plans to start or be < 30 days from beginning androgen deprivation therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients may receive palliative radiation therapy at the investigators discretion during the first 4 weeks of beginning protocol therapy.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No neuroendocrine, small cell or transitional cell cancer of the prostate
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: No abnormal bone metabolism (i.e., Paget's disease, untreated hyperthyroidism, untreated hyperprolactinemia, untreated Cushing's disease).
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No use of calcitonin within 14 days before being registered for protocol therapy or any previous use of bisphosphonates.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: No major surgery within 4 weeks of registration to protocol therapy.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No adjuvant chemotherapy within 6 months of registration to protocol therapy.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: No previous chemotherapy for metastatic disease.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: No hormonal therapy in the adjuvant setting within 12 months of registration to protocol therapy; previous hormonal therapy must not have exceeded 6 months.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No prior history of malignancy in the past 5 years with the exception of basal cell and squamous cell carcinoma of the skin.
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of lower urinary tract symptoms, including frequency, urgency, weak stream, incomplete emptying and intermittent flow for the past 9 months. He is otherwise healthy.
